about_the_game:
HOW DO YOU CLAP WITH ONE HAND?


Brace yourself for the ultimate slapdown! Get Slapped is a 3rd person action comedy fighting game, packed to the brim with crude slapstick humor and lore. Enter multidimensional arenas that will slap your baby bottomed mind smooth. Take on a cast of eclectic, electric and eccentric personalities as you rise through the ranks, facing off against bosses who will slap you down. It's time to show off your slap!

UNCOVER THE SECRETS OF THE SECRET SLAP SOCIETY


How. Da fuck. Are you versed in Art of the Slap? Special SSS invitation? Fine.

Keep it on the down low, or else EVERYONE will be lining up for our super, secret, exclusive to only the best of the best membership.

BECOME THE SSS CHAMPION


As a new member of the Secret Slap Society (SSS) you gotta show these slappas why you'll be the top BAMS. That's how you become a champ. YOU TAKE IT.

TREAT YO SELF


Nothing screams "Prepare to shit your pants" like mismatched clothing and accessories to confuse and assert dominance over your fellow Slapicans.



What's coming to Early Access:

  • First introduction to Get Slapped! lore and the expanding narrative
  • Explore the 1st hidden branch of the Secret Slap Society! Train, shop, & prep for slap battles
  • Battle three of the first Slapican fighters at unique environments
  • Early look at the Slap Shop! Purchase & try on cosmetics to customize your Slapican!

What's included with Early Access purchase:

  • Digital copy and access to base copy of Get Slapped!
  • Early Access supporter Exclusive digital item

More SSS renovations inbound!

  • Multiplayer functionality - Slap your friends!
  • Crossplay & porting to other platforms - Slap across dimensions!
  • Special year-round digital & IRL events - Slapsgiving & New Slaps Eve!
  • Different game modes - Hide & Slap!
  • More bosses and environments - More faces and places!
  • More cosmetic items - Slap in style!


DO NOT DISPLEASE THE GODHANDS.
See how to help the SSS reach it's true potential by achieving these renovations quicker!

content_descriptors.notes:
Although this game revolves around the repeated fictional violent acts of slapping others, nowhere do we encourage real life acts of physical, mental, verbal, or other forms of abuse.

If you or someone you know is expressing forms of harm to themselves or others please seek professional guidance. 

Although we believe humor and digital forms of violence can be a form of relief, holistic health and improvement of one's well being is super f**ken important to us and our community.

We created this game in good, stupid, silly, fun as a potential outlet for those seeking an alternative form of an emotional outlet, but should not replace facing your problems IRL. 

We want to continue this weird slap-train as long as possible, so take care of yourselves and others so we can slap on! Love y'all!

legal_notice:
Get Slapped - Trademark Pending

NOTICE: Trademark pending registration for Get Slapped!. Unauthorized use prohibited.

Get Slapped!, developed by Get Slapped LLC, is in the process of trademark registration. We intend to claim exclusive rights to our trademarks associated with the game.

During this pending status, unauthorized use of our trademarks is strictly prohibited. We kindly request all individuals and entities to refrain from using similar marks that may cause confusion.

For inquiries or concerns, please contact our legal department at info@getslappedgame.com

Thank you for your cooperation.

short_description: Get Slapped!™ is a slap-stick action comedy arena fighting game with an expanding narrative and roster of fighters. Compete to be the first slap champion across the multi-dimensions! Prepare to showcase your slap skills like never before!
